attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Home schoolers in Britain get no funds from the governmet. This is wrong. The argument that if they want education funding they should send their children to school is false. Many children educated at home have comunication disorders such as Aspergers Syndrome and ADHD and are bullied and fail in school when they could easily succeed
